languages.custom: The languages it knew in life

description.value:
Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 type=lightning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] casts [[lookup @item.name]].

The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become &Reference[invisible]{invisible} until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its &Reference[concentration]{concentration} ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Consume Life. As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 10 format=long]] against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains [[/damage 3d6 type=heal average=false]] hit points.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Ephemeral. The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Incorporeal Movement. The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes [[/damage 1d10 type=force average=true]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Variable Illumination. The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
